segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, and there's definitely some mischief afoot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are trying to get into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a wobbly-looking stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his hand is already inside, grabbing some treats!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing next to him, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, ready to catch whatever he pulls out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so determined in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s tilted quite a bit, which makes me a little nervous for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, what a clever plan they have devised!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely unaware of the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little moment of rebellion is quite endearing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they'll manage to get.
segments.speaker: PAR
